# RFQ Department of National Defense x Samsung E-Fota

## Tender Details

| ID | Title | Reference Number | Expected Contract Start Date | Notice Type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| WS4472601519-Doc4474636338 | RFQ Department of National Defense x Samsung E-Fota | 4472601519 | 2024-03-29 | Request for Information |

## Tender Description

This tender seeks a vendor to provide License management software to the Department of National Defense (DND) and the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). The purpose of this solicitation is to obtain quotes from eligible suppliers for the delivery of the requested software.

## Bidder Eligibility

* All bids must be received by 2:00pm EDT on March 15, 2024
* Vendors must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation document

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to vendors who are eligible under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Tender Notice URL

The tender notice can be accessed at the following URL:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19004932?extsite=MTkwMDQ5MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Contact Information

For more information about this solicitation, please contact:
Alexander Mateas, Procurement Specialist
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
Email: alexander.mateas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
